languages.text: "Славный Хальбрандт, не думаю, что тебе стоит идти с нами. Вижу, ты еще нескоро оправишься, а я не хочу держать ответ перед Всеотцом за то, что достойный воин глупо погиб из-за меня".

"Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "Славный Хальбрандт, не думаю, что тебе стоит идти с нами. Вижу, ты еще нескоро оправишься, а я не хочу держать ответ перед Всеотцом за то, что достойный воин глупо погиб из-за меня".

traits.locale_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

"Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

"Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

"Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

languages.text: “尊贵的哈尔布兰特，如果你和我们一起走，那恐怕就太不明智了。你得休息一段时间才能恢复，万一你死了，我可不想面对全父的怒火。我可不希望别人说，是乌尔法的愚蠢，害死了一位值得尊敬的战士。”
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: “尊贵的哈尔布兰特，如果你和我们一起走，那恐怕就太不明智了。你得休息一段时间才能恢复，万一你死了，我可不想面对全父的怒火。我可不希望别人说，是乌尔法的愚蠢，害死了一位值得尊敬的战士。”

languages.text: 「高貴なるハルブラントよ、俺らと共に行くなんて馬鹿はよせ。回復するまでしばらくかかるだろ。それに俺は、全知の父に、お前は死ぬべきだと答える必要があるとは思わない…立派な戦士がウルファーの手にかかってマヌケな最後を迎えたなんて、誰にも言わせん」
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴なるハルブラントよ、俺らと共に行くなんて馬鹿はよせ。回復するまでしばらくかかるだろ。それに俺は、全知の父に、お前は死ぬべきだと答える必要があるとは思わない…立派な戦士がウルファーの手にかかってマヌケな最後を迎えたなんて、誰にも言わせん」

languages.text: «Mi noble Halbrandt, sería una necedad que vinieras con nosotros. Tardarás un tiempo en recuperarte y no quiero tener que responder ante el Padre de todas las cosas si murieras. No soportaría que se dijera que un guerrero capaz murió en vano por culpa de Ulfar».
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: «Mi noble Halbrandt, sería una necedad que vinieras con nosotros. Tardarás un tiempo en recuperarte y no quiero tener que responder ante el Padre de todas las cosas si murieras. No soportaría que se dijera que un guerrero capaz murió en vano por culpa de Ulfar».

languages.text: « Noble Halbrandt, je crois qu'il serait imprudent pour toi de nous accompagner. Il te faudra du temps pour te rétablir et je ne veux pas répondre de ta mort devant le Père de Tous. Personne ne dira qu'un valeureux guerrier a connu une fin futile à cause d'Ulfar. »
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: « Noble Halbrandt, je crois qu'il serait imprudent pour toi de nous accompagner. Il te faudra du temps pour te rétablir et je ne veux pas répondre de ta mort devant le Père de Tous. Personne ne dira qu'un valeureux guerrier a connu une fin futile à cause d'Ulfar. »

languages.text: "Edler Halbrandt, ich hielte es für unklug, wenn Ihr mit uns kommen würdet. Es wird eine Weile dauern, bis Ihr gesundet seid, und ich will mich nicht vor dem Allvater verantworten müssen, solltet Ihr sterben – niemand soll sagen, ein würdiger Krieger sei wegen Ulfar sinnlos zu Tode gekommen."
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: "Edler Halbrandt, ich hielte es für unklug, wenn Ihr mit uns kommen würdet. Es wird eine Weile dauern, bis Ihr gesundet seid, und ich will mich nicht vor dem Allvater verantworten müssen, solltet Ihr sterben – niemand soll sagen, ein würdiger Krieger sei wegen Ulfar sinnlos zu Tode gekommen."

languages.text: "Soylu Halbrandt, bizimle gelmenin mantıklı olmayacağını düşünüyorum. Senin iyileşmen biraz uzun sürecek. Eğer ölürsen Yücebaba'ya hesap veren kişi olmak istemiyorum. Ayrıca kimsenin değerli bir savaşçı Ulfar yüzünden aptalca bir son bulmuş demesini de istemem."
languages.original_text: "Noble Halbrandt, it would be unwise for you to come with us, I think. It will be some time before you are well, and I do not want to have to answer to the Allfather should you die — let no one say a worthy warrior met his foolish end because of Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: "Soylu Halbrandt, bizimle gelmenin mantıklı olmayacağını düşünüyorum. Senin iyileşmen biraz uzun sürecek. Eğer ölürsen Yücebaba'ya hesap veren kişi olmak istemiyorum. Ayrıca kimsenin değerli bir savaşçı Ulfar yüzünden aptalca bir son bulmuş demesini de istemem."
